pages.disclaimers: LuxeWallets - Disclaimers and Legal Information LuxeWallets HOME ABOUT US Wallets CONTACT Disclaimers Please read the following disclaimers carefully before using this website or making any purchases. By using this website, you agree to be bound by these disclaimers. **Product Information:** We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our products. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is completely error-free. We reserve the right to change product information at any time without prior notice. **Pricing and Availability:** Prices and availability of products are subject to change without notice. We make every effort to ensure the accuracy of pricing information, but errors may occasionally occur. We reserve the right to correct any pricing errors. **Images:** Images of products on our website may not be an exact representation of the actual product. Colors and details may vary slightly due to factors such as lighting and screen resolution. **Use of Website:** This website is for your personal use only. You may not use this website for any commercial purposes without our express written consent. **External Links:** This website may contain links to external websites that are not under our control. We are not responsible for the content or accuracy of any external websites. **Warranties:** We make no warranties, expressed or implied, with respect to the products or services offered on this website. All products are offered "as is" and "as available" with no warranties of any kind. **Limitation of Liability:** We shall not be liable for any damages arising out of your use of this website or the products or services offered on this website. pages.privacy-policy: LuxeWallets - Privacy Policy LuxeWallets HOME ABOUT US Wallets CONTACT Privacy Policy LuxeWallets respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect **Personal Information:** When you place an order, create an account, or contact us, you may provide us with certain personal information, such as your name, billing address, shipping address, email address, and phone number. **Automatic Information:** We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and the referring website. How We Use Your Information To fulfill your orders and provide customer service. To send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers. (You can opt out of receiving marketing communications at any time). To improve our website and your shopping experience. How We Share Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and business, such as payment processors and shipping companies. We may also disclose your information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is necessary to protect our rights or the rights of others. Your Choices You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. You can access and update your personal information by logging into your account. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any changes to this privacy policy on our website. The LuxeWallets website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline LuxeWallets - Premium Wallets. Home About Us Products Contact Us Legal Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
